full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN NOR SGRUB KYI GTOR CHOG DNGOS GRUB BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,(CES DAM CAN NOR SGRUB KYI GTOR CHOG DNGOS GRUB BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI, MTSO KHRI SHOG RGYAL MO'I 'GRAM DU 'KHOD PA'I BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG PE'I LE MI 'GYUR RAB BRTAN RDO RJE'I SHOG NAS DAR HAN NANG SO DGE SLONG YE SHES BSKAL BZANG GIS KHO RANG GI SDER GTOGS RNAMS KYI RIGS BRGYUD KYI BSRUNGS MA YIN PAS GTOR CHOG CHA CHED RGYAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL NGOR, DAM CAN NOR BDAG TU SGRUB TSUL MI 'DRA BA 'GA' ZHIG MCHIS PA LAS, , NOR SGRUB SNYING GI DUM BU'I LUGS LTAR LA, ,NGAG 'DON GYI TSIG RNAMS KYANG YIG RNYING BYIN CAN @020B BYUNG DREGS PA 'DI RIGS RGYUD 'KHUL BA'I CHE BAR BSAMS SRUNG MA 'DI LA MDA' BRNYES PA'I RIG 'DZIN GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG LA TSIG ZUR CUNG ZAD BSGYUR DGOS RNAMS BCOS SHING, GSAR SPEL GANG 'OS KYIS BRGYAN TE, , RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL PA ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SKYED TSAL YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BRTAN 'PHEL GYIS BGYIS PA) DZA YANTU, ,LEGS SO, ,
